mapper.insert: insert into SPRINGREPLY(rno, bno, REPLYTEXT, email, nickname) values (REPLYSEQ.nextval,#{bno},#{replytext},#{email},#{nickname})
mapper.select: select * from springreply where bno = #{bno} order by regdate desc
mapper.update: update SPRINGREPLY set REPLYTEXT = #{replytext}, regdate=sysdate where rno = #{rno}
